fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Computer, Property, Project
from django.db.models import Count
query = Computer.productive.scope(request.user.userprofile).select_related('sync_user').all()
if parameters['value'] != '':
    if str(parameters['exact']) == 'True':
        query = query.filter(sync_attributes__property_att__id=parameters['property_att'], sync_attributes__value=parameters['value'])
        fld = 'sync_attributes.filter(property_att__id=parameters["property_att"], value=parameters["value"]).values_list("value", flat=True)'
    else:
        query = query.filter(sync_attributes__property_att__id=parameters['property_att'], sync_attributes__value__contains=parameters['value'])
        fld = 'sync_attributes.filter(property_att__id=parameters["property_att"], value__contains=parameters["value"]).values_list("value", flat=True)'
    if parameters['project']:
        query = query.select_related('project').filter(project__id=parameters['project'])
query = query.annotate(n=Count('id'))
property = Property.objects.get(pk=parameters['property_att'])
fields = ('link', fld, 'project', 'sync_user.link', 'sync_start_date')
titles = ('computer', property.name.lower(), 'project', 'sync user', 'date of login')
fields.name: Production Computers by Attributes...
fields.parameters:
from migasfree.server.models import Property, Project

def form_params(request):
    from migasfree.server.forms import ParametersForm
    from django import forms
    class myForm(ParametersForm):
        property_att = forms.ModelChoiceField(Property.objects.all())
        project = forms.ModelChoiceField(Project.objects.scope(request.user.userprofile), required=False)
        value = forms.CharField()
        exact = forms.ChoiceField(((False,'No'), (True,'Yes')))
    return myForm
fields.description: Computer list that have a certain attribute

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Computer
query = Computer.productive.scope(request.user.userprofile).select_related('project').filter(software_inventory__contains=parameters['package'])
if parameters['project']:
    query = query.filter(project=parameters['project'])
query = query.order_by('sync_end_date')
fields = ('link', 'project.link', 'sync_end_date', 'product')
titles = ('Computer', 'Project', 'Last Update', 'Product')

fields.code:
from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
from datetime import datetime, timedelta, date
from migasfree.server.models import Computer
last_days = int(parameters.get('days', 0))
if last_days <= 0:
    last_days = 1
delta = timedelta(days=1)
n = date.today() - ((last_days - 1) * delta)
query = Computer.productive.scope(request.user.userprofile).select_related('project').filter(created_at__gte=n, created_at__lt=date.today() + delta).order_by('-created_at')
fields = ('link', 'project', 'created_at', 'ip_address')
titles = (_('Computer'), _('Project'), _('Date Input'), _('IP'))
